item.title: BANCPLUS CORP 10-K
item.description: BANCPLUS CORP, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 04, 2022 had 53520 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: bancplus - 1241 instances loans - 520 instances 31 - 427 instances december - 417 instances financial - 415 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
